headerText: The `v-breadcrumbs` component is a navigational helper for pages. It can accept a **Material Icons** icon or text characters as a divider. An array of objects can be passed to the **items** property of the component.  Additionally, slots exists for more control of the breadcrumbs, either utilizing `v-breadcrumbs-item` or other custom markup.
headerAlert1: By default `v-breadcrumbs` will disable all crumbs up to the current page in a nested paths. You can prevent this behavior by using `exact: true` on each applicable breadcrumb in the `items` array.

usage.desc: By default, breadcrumbs use a text divider. This can be any string.

icon-dividers.desc: For the icon variant, breadcrumbs can use any icon in Material Design Icons.

item-slot.desc: You can use the `item` slot to customize each breadcrumb.

large.desc: Large breadcrumbs have larger font size.

divider.desc: Breadcrumbs separator can be set using `divider` property.

props.divider: Specifies the dividing character between items.
props.icons: Specifies that the dividers between items are [v-icon](/components/icons)s.
props.items: An array of objects for each breadcrumb.
props.justifyEnd: Align the breadcrumbs at the end.
props.large: Increase the font-size of the breadcrumb item text to 16px (14px default).

slots.item: The slot used to override default `v-breadcrumbs-item` behavior when using the **items** prop.
